# Graphics API Reference Complete reference documentation for Vista Graphics API functions. ## API Categories - [Draw Commands](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/draw-commands/) - All draw commands - [Transform Commands](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/transform-commands/) - Transform commands - [Color Commands](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/color-commands/) - Color and gradient commands - [Graphics Functions](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/graphics-functions/) - Helper functions ## Quick Reference `; Draw commands line, box, circle, ellipse, polygon, ... ; Transform commands translate, rotate, scale, skew, ... ; Color commands pen, fill, rgb, rgba, gradient, ...` ## See Also - [Vista Graphics](/wiki/graphics/) - Main graphics documentation - [Concepts](/wiki/graphics/concepts/) - Graphics fundamentals
